summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the laying off, opening, widening and establishing of portions of Northeast Northgate Way between 1st Avenue Northeast and a point approximately 80 feet east of 15th Avenue Northeast at existing center line grade, all as a part of the "Northeast Northgate Way, et al, Paving, etc." project; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, including property rights necessary for cut and fill slopes on certain abutting properties and providing payment thereof.
